document.full_text: greece and a team of eu/imf/ecb inspectors are set to conclude talks by thursday on a medium-term fiscal plan including the government's progress toward meeting budget targets, a greek newspaper reported on wednesday.
document.title: greece to complete bailout talks by thursday: paper
lines_and_colors: greece and a team of eu/imf/ecb inspectors are set to conclude talks by thursday on a medium-term fiscal plan including the government's progress toward meeting budget targets, a greek newspaper reported on wednesday.
